module.name: crawler-module
module.description: Web crawling tools for extracting content from web pages

web_crawler.name: web_crawler
web_crawler.description: Crawls web pages and extracts content including text, links, and metadata

url.description: The URL of the webpage to crawl

waitForSelector.description: Optional CSS selector to wait for before extracting content

limit.description: Optional limit for number of links to extract (default: 100)

content.description: Text content extracted from the webpage

links.description: Array of links found on the page

images.description: Array of images found on the page

metadata.description: Page metadata including title, description, etc.
